tnet.sockets

Class TSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • tnet.sockets.TSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    tlist.TListKeyObject<java.lang.Integer>

    public class TSocket
extends java.lang.Object
implements tlist.TListKeyObject<java.lang.Integer>
    A Class to save a socket with its ObjectStreams
